org.contentmine.svg2xml.table

Class TableContentCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.svg2xml.page.PageLayoutAnalyzer
      • org.contentmine.svg2xml.table.TableContentCreator

  • public class TableContentCreator
extends PageLayoutAnalyzer
    IMPORTANT2017 creates structured content from SVGElement uses caches to extract high level obecjts and then create tables Probably will have siblings to do the same for Plots. 2017-10 integrating TextChunkCache into previous
    Author:
    pm286
